801.description: a big truck with a side tipper and tail gate + raise bed to dump

oil.name: Oil
oil.location: description of location, where to fill if it's different than dipstick, and how to open

transmissionFluid.name: Transmission Fluid
transmissionFluid.type: green monster brand, extra scary type
transmissionFluid.notes: must be checked when transmission system is at full operating temperature.

coolant.name: Coolant
coolant.type: RED YOU MUST USE RED PLEASE
coolant.notes: make sure to taste it before filling

tires.name: Tires
tires.notes: The inner tires can be checked and filled from through the outers

frontLights.name: Front Lights
frontLights.notes: high beam, low beam, running light, signals

topLights.name: Top Lights
topLights.notes: running lights on or near top on front back and sides

sideLights.name: Side Lights
sideLights.notes: type and location, IE side lights found on side

airTanks.name: Air Tanks
airTanks.notes: on colder days, air tanks should be emptied at end of shift by turning valves..

CNG.name: CNG
CNG.notes: This is a CNG truck. Please fill in front or on side.

holdBreath.name: Hold Breath
holdBreath.explanation: you have to hold your breath when you start it

tipper.name: Tipper
tipper.explanation: Make sure the latch is fixed on the crossbar before raising the tipper all the way up or you'll end up with a bin in truck.

magicWords.name: Magic Words
magicWords.explanation: you have to say the magic words when using the PTO or it will explode

box3.name: Box 3
box3.description: a box truck, shorter than box 4, unfolding liftgate from lower

lockedIgnition.name: Can't turn key
lockedIgnition.explanation: If you cannot turn the key, jerk the steering wheel rapidly back and forth while turning the key.

devestator.name: Devestator
devestator.description: Coming for you and yo mama.

destruction.name: Pure Destruction
destruction.explanation: If you're not careful, then you'll get destroyed. This thing is not safe.
